attributes.action: fund the dualling of the A361 North Devon Link Road.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since it opened 20 years ago, there have been dozens of deaths on the North Devon Link Road - the A361 between Tiverton and Barnstaple and the A39 between Barnstaple and Bideford. So far in 2007, there have been at least 7 deaths alerady, compared to 1 in the past 5 years on the dual carriageway near Tiverton. With this evidence that dualling is the only way that stops deaths, please support this petition to get this road dualled.
